languages.text: {n}Магос Паскаль Ханейманн передал свои откровения слугам Омниссии на Кьяве Гамма, что позволило им воздвигнуть устройство-посредник, смягчившее глас Ноль-Халифа. И тогда взмолились магосы пред могучим духом машины, смиренно прося его вступить в союз с Вольным Торговцем и даровать свои откровения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Магос Паскаль Ханейманн передал свои откровения слугам Омниссии на Кьяве Гамма, что позволило им воздвигнуть устройство-посредник, смягчившее глас Ноль-Халифа. И тогда взмолились магосы пред могучим духом машины, смиренно прося его вступить в союз с Вольным Торговцем и даровать свои откровения.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Магос Паскаль Ханейманн передал свои откровения слугам Омниссии на Кьяве Гамма, что позволило им воздвигнуть устройство-посредник, смягчившее глас Ноль-Халифа. И тогда взмолились магосы пред могучим духом машины, смиренно прося его вступить в союз с Вольным Торговцем и даровать свои откровения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries. And Null Caliph answered: upon concluding its sacred calculations, it bestowed its favour upon the pleading. With its tireless, unblinking eye observing the warp currents, many a traveller was saved from peril.{/n}

{n}Undisturbed by mortals, the data-engine continued its great calculation. Soon after that three tech-priests received a directive from Procedure 0-Х to abandon their posts and start working on a relic the making of which cost them their lives. The workers are whispering about a sinister spirit haunting the ancient facility.{/n}

{n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. With its tireless, unblinking eye observing the warp currents, many a traveller was saved from peril.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡·哈努曼贤者将他的秘密告诉了基亚瓦伽马星上的欧姆尼塞亚仆人，让他们组装一台调停装置，软化虚无哈里发的声音。众多贤者向强大的机魂祈祷，谦卑地请求它与行商浪人结盟，分享它的奥秘。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡·哈努曼贤者将他的秘密告诉了基亚瓦伽马星上的欧姆尼塞亚仆人，让他们组装一台调停装置，软化虚无哈里发的声音。众多贤者向强大的机魂祈祷，谦卑地请求它与行商浪人结盟，分享它的奥秘。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El magos Pasqal Haneumann transmitió sus secretos a los siervos del Omnissiah en Kiava Gamma, permitiéndoles ensamblar un dispositivo mediador que suavizaba la voz de Null Caliph. Los magos rezaron entonces al poderoso espíritu máquina, pidiéndole humildemente que se aliara con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y compartiera sus misterios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El magos Pasqal Haneumann transmitió sus secretos a los siervos del Omnissiah en Kiava Gamma, permitiéndoles ensamblar un dispositivo mediador que suavizaba la voz de Null Caliph. Los Magos rezaron entonces al poderoso espíritu máquina, pidiéndole humildemente que se aliara con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y compartiera sus misterios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マゴス・パスカル・ヘニュマンンは、キアヴァ・ガンマで万機神の従者にその秘密を伝授し、彼らはヌル・カリフの声を和らげる調停装置を組み立てることができるようになった。そして賢人は、強大な機械精霊に祈りを捧げ、ローグトレーダーと同盟を結び、その謎を分かち合うよう謙虚に求めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マゴス・パスカル・ヘニュマンンは、キアヴァ・ガンマで万機神の従者にその秘密を伝授し、彼らはヌル・カリフの声を和らげる調停装置を組み立てることができるようになった。そして賢人は、強大な機械精霊に祈りを捧げ、ローグトレーダーと同盟を結び、その謎を分かち合うよう謙虚に求めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le magos Pasqal Haneumann révèle ses secrets aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sur Kiava Gamma, leur permettant d'assembler un médiator à même d'atténuer la voix de Null Caliph. Ils prient alors le puissant esprit de la machine de s'allier {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et de lever le voile sur les mystères qui l'entourent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le magos Pasqal Haneumann révèle ses secrets aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sur Kiava Gamma, leur permettant d'assembler un médiator à même d'atténuer la voix de Null Caliph. Ils prient alors le puissant esprit de la machine de s'allier {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et de lever le voile sur les mystères qui l'entourent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann gab seine Geheimnisse an die Diener des Omnissiah auf Kiava Gamma weiter. Dadurch konnten sie ein Mediatorgerät herstellen, welches Null Caliphs Stimme abschwächte. Sodann beteten die Magi zum mächtigen Maschinengeist und baten ihn demütig, ein Bündnis mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einzugehen und seine Geheimnisse zu offenbaren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann, sırlarını Kiava Gama'daki Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarına aktararak Hiçlik Halifesi'nin ses şiddetini hafifleten ara bulucu cihazını üretmeye vesile oldu. Daha sonra makine ruhuna dua eden Magoslar, Hür Tacir'le ittifak kurup hikmetlerini paylaşması için ricada bulundular.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Magos Pasqal Haneumann imparted his secrets to the Omnissiah's servants on Kiava Gamma, allowing them to assemble a mediator device that softened Null Caliph's voice. The Magi then prayed to the mighty machine spirit, humbly asking it to make an alliance with the Rogue Trader and share its mysteries.{/n}
